artist: Artist: Willie Cole; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: black and white vertical image of ironing board underside; board has seven vertical panels with an alternating circle and cross pattern, and scattered scratches and marks throughout; section of board at BC border is folded back A suite of five prints (Savannah, Dot, Fannie Mae, Queen, Anna Mae) selected by the artist and printed intaglio style from ironing boards flattened and distressed to the artist's approval. The name of each board was relief printed, bottom center, in a medium gray from a photopolymer plate. The artist's intention is for the suite of five prints to be shown together and remain as a set.
image_copyright: Copyright © Willie Cole%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LLC in pencil: EV ARCHIVE 1/2 | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LLC: HP
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LRC in pencil: Wille Cole 2012 | BC printed in gray: QUEEN
title: Queen
